description: Children and adolescents constitute almost a third (2·2 billion individuals) of the world’s population and almost 90% live in low and middle-income countries (LAMIC), where they form up to 50% of the population. Mental health problems affect 10–20% of children and adolescents worldwide. Half of the mental disorders are estimated to have onset by the age of 14 years. Early identification and treatment of these disorders can improve the outcome and prognosis of psychiatric illnesses. There is a huge burden of child and adolescent mental health (CAMH) in Nepal which has a population of around 29 million and 40–50% of the population comprises of children and adolescents. Services provided for child and adolescent mental health problems include the following: – Assessment, diagnosis and interventions/treatment of Neurodevelopmental Disorders such as Autism Spectrum Disorder, Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder (ADHD), Specific Learning Disorders, Intellectual Disability, Communication Disorders, Tic Disorders etc. – Assessment of family, parenting styles with inputs for parenting and management of temper tantrums. – Assessment, diagnosis and treatment of; * Depressive Disorders, Anxiety Disorders, Obsessive Compulsive Disorders, School refusal * Trauma and Stress related disorders (Adjustment Disorders, Dissociative Disorders, Post traumatic Stress Disorder) * Somatic symptom and related disorders * Feeding and Eating Disorders (Pica, Anorexia Nervosa, Bulimia Nervosa, Binge Eating Disorder) * Elimination Disorders (Enuresis, Encopresis) * Gender Dysphoria * Substance Related and Addictive Disorders * Disruptive, Impulse Control and Conduct Disorders (ODD, Conduct Disorder) * Severe mental illnesses (Schizophrenia, Bipolar Disorder)

description: The Intensive Care Unit (ICU) at Grande International Hospital (GIH) is a state-of-the-art facility committed to delivering world-class critical care. Designed to manage a wide spectrum of life-threatening conditions, the ICU is staffed by a dedicated team of critical care specialists, supported by multidisciplinary consultants, one-to-one nursing care, and a team of allied health professionals. Our core objectives are: · Excellence in patient care · Evidence-based clinical practice · Patient safety · Patient comfort and dignity GIH was one of the pioneering institutions in Nepal to adopt the closed ICU model, ensuring that all patients are managed under the direct supervision of intensive care specialists. It was also the first hospital in the country to introduce individual cubicle-style ICU rooms, a design that significantly reduces the risk of cross-infection while enhancing patient privacy. In addition to the adult ICU, GIH is equipped with specialized neonatal and pediatric ICUs, each staffed by experts in their respective fields. The hospital currently houses a total of 45 ICU beds — 30 adult and 15 paediatric/neonatal — making it one of the most comprehensive critical care facilities in the region.

description: Skin & Aesthetic Clinic – Comprehensive Dermatology and Advanced Aesthetic Care Our state-of-the-art Skin & Aesthetic Clinic, housed within our multi-specialty corporate hospital, offers a full spectrum of dermatological and cosmetic services. We specialize in the diagnosis and treatment of hair, skin, and nail disorders, as well as comprehensive management of sexually transmitted infections (STIs). Led by a team of experienced dermatologists and trained aesthetic professionals, our clinic combines clinical excellence with advanced technology to deliver personalized care for every patient. Our services span across medical dermatology, aesthetic dermatology, and laser therapies, ensuring holistic skin health and cosmetic rejuvenation under one roof. Key Offerings: Medical Dermatology: Acne, eczema, psoriasis, vitiligo, fungal infections, and other common skin conditions Hair fall and scalp disorders, including alopecia Nail diseases and infections Diagnosis and management of STIs with confidentiality and sensitivity Advanced Aesthetic Treatments: Chemical peels, microneedling, and anti-aging therapies Skin brightening and pigmentation correction Non-surgical skin tightening and rejuvenation PRP (Platelet-Rich Plasma) for skin and hair, hair restoration. Laser and Light-Based Technologies: Laser hair reduction Tattoo and pigmentation removal Acne scar and wrinkle reduction Vascular lesion and mole removal Hydrafacial Our clinic is equipped with the latest laser and diagnostic technologies to ensure safe, effective, and minimally invasive treatments. We follow stringent clinical protocols and maintain international standards of hygiene and patient care.

Prof. Dr. Akhilesh Kumar Kashyap Consultant – Gastroenterology & Liver Diseases Professional Summary: Assoc. Prof. Dr. Akhilesh Kumar Kashyap is a highly accomplished and internationally trained gastroenterologist with extensive experience in the diagnosis and treatment of gastrointestinal and liver diseases. With a strong academic background and specialized training in therapeutic endoscopy, ERCP, EUS, and liver care, Dr. Kashyap brings a comprehensive approach to digestive health management. He completed his foundational medical education in Nepal and pursued postgraduate studies and fellowships at some of the most prestigious institutions in India and the UK. His practice is informed by advanced skills in diagnostic and therapeutic procedures, and he has held faculty positions at several leading medical colleges in Nepal. Dr. Kashyap is widely recognized for his expertise in hepatobiliary diseases and gastrointestinal endoscopy, and he actively contributes to both academic and clinical gastroenterology in the region. Academic Background: • MBBS – B.P. Koirala Institute of Health Sciences (BPKIHS), Dharan, Nepal • MD (Internal Medicine) – Manipal Hospital, Bangalore, India • DM (Gastroenterology) – National Academy of Medical Sciences (NAMS), Bir Hospital, Nepal • Fellowship in Gastroenterology – All India Institute of Medical Sciences (AIIMS), New Delhi, India • Postgraduate Training – Sir Ganga Ram Hospital, New Delhi, India • Short-Term Training in ERCP & EUS – Asian Institute of Gastroenterology (AIG), Hyderabad, India • FRCP – Royal College of Physicians, Edinburgh, United Kingdom Dr. Kashyap’s academic qualifications reflect a continuous pursuit of medical excellence and skill development in advanced gastroenterological procedures. Areas of Expertise: • Liver Diseases – Management of hepatitis, cirrhosis, and metabolic liver conditions • Therapeutic Endoscopy – ERCP, EUS, polypectomy, and gastrointestinal bleeding interventions Dr. Kashyap’s clinical approach integrates cutting-edge diagnostic techniques with therapeutic interventions to ensure precision-based, patient-centered care. Professional Memberships: Dr. Kashyap is a member of several distinguished national and international medical associations, enabling active participation in clinical research, continued medical education, and global collaboration in the field of gastroenterology: • Nepal Medical Council (NMC) • Nepal Medical Association (NMA) • World Endoscopy Organization • Nepalese Society of Gastroenterologists • Nepalese Association for the Study of Liver Diseases • Indian National Association for the Study of Liver Diseases Trainings & Certifications: • Long-term Fellowship in Gastroenterology – AIIMS, New Delhi • Postgraduate Clinical Training – Sir Ganga Ram Hospital, New Delhi • Short-term Training in ERCP & EUS – Asian Institute of Gastroenterology, Hyderabad • FRCP – Royal College of Physicians, Edinburgh, UK These specialized trainings underscore Dr. Kashyap’s commitment to clinical excellence in gastroenterology and endoscopic procedures. Languages Spoken: • Nepali • English • Hindi Dr. Kashyap’s multilingual fluency enhances his ability to offer personalized and empathetic care to a diverse patient population. At Grande International Hospital: At Grande International Hospital, Assoc. Prof. Dr. Akhilesh Kumar Kashyap serves as a Consultant in Gastroenterology and Liver Diseases. His global training, academic leadership, and technical proficiency in liver care and therapeutic endoscopy contribute to the hospital’s excellence in gastroenterological services. Dr. Kashyap is dedicated to providing individualized, evidence-based treatment that ensures the best outcomes for patients with complex digestive disorders.

description: Grande Department of Nephrology and Renal Transplant Medicine offers a comprehensive state of the art health care to the patients across the range of kidney diseases including dialysis, transplant, plasmapheresis, immunoadsorption, renal histopathology and immmuno-histochemistry and stands as a pioneer corporate hospital in the country providing hemodialysis service even for the government supported free dialysis program to the patients. Grande nephrology department is the first private institute to start renal transplant service. Till date Grande has completed more than 120 successful renal transplant including ABO incompatible, seropostive(HIV,HBV & HCV positive patients) and the sensitized recipients cases. Recently Grande has optimized its hemodialysis service allocating a dedicated hemodialyis machine in ICU for patients needing multi disciplinary care. On top of it, Grande hospital is the only institute in the country providing the renal histo-pathology including immune-histo-chemistry service which has not only enhanced the patient care and timely treatment in severe kidney diseases like RPGN and transplant rejection but also economical and convenient to the patient by getting the reports easily. Our team of experienced nephrologists along with well trained nursing staffs, transplant coordinators, well equipped hemodialysi unit & OR, transplant ward and transplant surgeons provides services to all classes of patients across the country. Services offered: – Outpatient and Inpatient Services – Kidney Transplantation Services – Hemodialysis Services (Emergency Hemodialysis, ICU Dialysis, Maintenance Hemodialysis) – CAPD and CAPD Catheter Implantation – Temporary and Permanent Hemodialysis Catheter Insertion – Renal Biopsy – Plasmapheresis – Immunoadsorption Therapy – AV Fistula Creation

description: Department of Nutrition and Dietetics A healthy balanced diet is that which meets nutritional requirement that ensures normal growth, development and ageing, helps to sustain a healthy body weight, and minimizes the risk of chronic disease leading to better outcome and thus is crucial for everyone throughout life. Clinical dietitians are health care professionals who are qualified to improve people’s health and nutritional status by providing adequate, smart and healthy food choices. General scope The department of Nutrition and Dietetics forms an integral part of the patient care services of GIH. The Department strives to improve human health and lifestyle through proven dietary interventions, ideas, plans, Nutrition care process and the dissemination of nutrition information through means of effective Nutrition education and counseling. The protocol or method used is SOAP method (Subjective, objective, Assessment and plan). Personalized diet plans are made incorporating the nutritional requirements, medical condition, allergies and intolerances of the individual. The socio-cultural factors, economic, religious factors , access , availability, dietary habits as well as dislikes and preferences are also taken in consideration. Our Service Areas Clinical Nutritionists and Dietitians are well proficient and experienced in providing effective diet chart , education and counseling in following areas. – Diabetes mellitus (Pre- diabetes, Hyperglycemia, Gestational diabetes, Secondary diabetes etc.) – Malnutrition (Overweight , Obesity , Underweight ) – Renal diseases(CKD, Dialysis, AKI, Stone etc.) – Gastro-intestinal diseases – Neurological diseases – Cardiac diseases – Pediatrics – Geriatrics – Pregnancy and Lactation – Food related allergies and intolerances – Pre and post operative conditions – Critical care Nutrition and so on Apart from this, holistic approach with additional tips and ideas on lifestyle, behavior etc. are also suggested to reach better outcome rapidly while considering the practicality of its adherence. Ds. Usha Shah Nutrition and Dietetics

description: 1. Spine Services: Center for Spinal Surgery and Rehabilitation (CSSR) The back, which supports the body, is a crucial organ, and backaches are among the most frequent illnesses for which people visit the hospital. The patients are extensively evaluated by our trained team of spine surgeons, who then either treat them with medication, rehabilitation, or in the worst instance, surgery. In addition, our group has effectively treated a variety of complex spine illnesses, including malignancies. Our team of professionals offers innovative services for Spinal injury Deformity Degenerative Infection Tumor CSRR is the dedicated center for all kinds of spine-related conditions. With nearly 15 years of experience, a team of spine surgeons has been able to perform > 2000 surgeries with results comparable in par with the best centers in the world. 2. Arthroscopy, Sports Medicine and Joint Replacement The department of orthopedics is famous for providing sophisticated, yet compassionate, care for these illnesses, whether they are caused by severe joint damage or old age joint deterioration. We have performed a number of successful joint replacements and have treated several athletes. We can meet practically all of our patients’ orthopedic demands, no matter how basic or complex, thanks to our highly skilled staff in arthroscopy and joint replacement. 3. Traumatology A dedicated team of trauma surgeons take care of trauma, which mostly involves the limbs and the bones. With no delay, the surgeons manage trauma immediately and procedures are planned and executed any time of the day or night, so that the patient can have early recovery and less changes of complications of delay in the treatment. 4. Joint replacement surgery 5. Tumor surgery 6. Bone and joint infection 7. Pediatric orthopedic surgery

doctors.name: Dr. Binod Bijukachhe
doctors.designation: Medical Director, Chief-Department of Orthopedics, Director- Division of Spine Surgery
doctors.education: M.B.B.S. M.S. (Orthopedics) AO Fellowship – Spine Surgery POSNA COUR Fellowship Council Number: 2389 Profile: Dr. Binod Bijukachhe is a leading orthopedic and spine surgeon in Nepal, renowned for his clinical expertise, academic contributions, and leadership in advancing orthopedic care. With over 25 years of experience, he currently serves as the Medical Director and Head of the Department of Orthopedics at Grande International Hospital, Kathmandu, where he also directs the Division of Spine Surgery. He is the Senior Faculty and Program Coordinator for National Board of Medical Specialty (NBMS) program in Orthopedic surgery. He is also the Program Director and the Mentor in clinical Fellowship in Spinal Reconstruction and Rehabilitation (FSRR). Dr. Bijukachhe’s academic journey began with distinction, earning his MBBS from Rajshahi Medical College, Bangladesh, where he graduated first in his class. He completed his MS in Orthopedics from Kathmandu University with an impressive distinction score. His pursuit of specialized training led him to prestigious fellowships, including AO Spine Surgery at Amrita Institute of Medical Sciences, India, and Pediatric Orthopedic Fellowship at the University of Texas Health Science Center (USA), Children Hospital of Philadelphia (USA), San Francisco General Hospital (USA). In addition, he has obtained dedicated trainings on various aspects of spinal disorders from Australia, Germany and Japan. Dr. Bijukachhe is the pioneer and is the first one to introduce and begin Spinal Deformity Correction surgery, Spinal Instrumentation techniques, Spinal Reconstruction techniques and spinal decompression techniques in Nepal. His clinical focus spans spinal disorders, pediatric orthopedics, complex trauma surgery, and rehabilitation. He is widely respected for his surgical precision, compassionate care, and commitment to patient outcomes. Throughout his career, Dr. Bijukachhe has held key positions at B & B Hospital and the Hospital and Rehabilitation Center for Disabled Children, where he served as consultant and medical in-charge. He is the founding member of Association of Spine Surgeons of Nepal (ASSN) and has served as the General Secretary, Vice President and the President of the association. Dr. Bijukachhe is a prolific academic, with numerous publications in national and international journals. His research includes topics such as spinal tuberculosis, tibial nonunion, clubfoot management, and pediatric hip arthrodesis. His work has earned him accolades including the Mahendra Vidya Bhusan Class B and C (Bestowed by the King of Nepal), Agrani Bank and Dr. A.K. Khan Gold Medals (Bestowed by prime minister Khaleda Zia, Bangladesh), and the prestigious Suprabal Janasewa Shree awarded by the President of Nepal. He also received the Best English Paper Award at JSSR 2018 in Kobe, Japan. Beyond clinical and academic excellence, Dr. Bijukachhe is a passionate organizer of medical conferences. He has led several landmark events, including the International Conferences on Ponseti Method of Clubfoot Correction, Nepal–America Spine Conference (NASCON), International Symposium on Pediatric Orthopedics and Trauma (ISPOT), Pediatric Orthopedic Symposium (PedOS), Nepal-New Zealand-Australia-USA spine conference and Himalaya spine symposiums. These gatherings have fostered global collaboration and elevated Nepal’s presence in the orthopedic community. Fluent in English, Nepali, Hindi, Bengali, and Newari, Dr. Bijukachhe bridges cultural and linguistic gaps in patient care and professional exchange. His dedication to orthopedic advancement, mentorship, and service has made him a respected figure both nationally and internationally.

description: General Pediatrics: Pediatrics is a specialty that tackles the diseases in children below sixteen years. This department has a dedicated vaccination unit that provides vaccines according to the national policy and also special vaccines as per the child’s need. Pediatric Pulmonology: Respiratory diseases is not rare in children. Be it asthma or any other respiratory disease, our specialists meticulously work up the child to diagnose and then treat with the best evidence based treatment. Features: · 24X7 Pediatric Emergency Service : 24 x 7 Pediatric Service available through well trained Pediatrician ( PICU / NICU / Ward / Emergency) · 24X7 Pediatric OPD Service. · Healthy Baby Clinic. · 24X7 Free Neonatal Care Counseling. · Well managed NICU (14 bed). · Well managed PICU (6 bed) including one Isolation bed. · Vaccination services according to national policy & special vaccine as per child’s need. · Units are well managed with the team of best doctor’s and latest technology. · Pediatric Pulmonology / Cardiology · Vaccination Center : o All government vaccine available free of cost. o Additional vaccine also available o Adult / Student travelling abroad This department deals with emergency and elective surgical diseases of newborns to 15 years of age. We also deal with prenatal counseling about fetal surgical issues for better post-natal care and further management. Neonatal surgical problems are birth defects and anomalies. Pediatric surgical diseases are general and common pediatric surgery, pediatric urology, pediatric surgical oncology and pediatric Burns. From simple surgeries to complicated neonatal and pediatric surgeries, our Pediatric surgeons have proven themselves with careful and precise surgeries that have given the best possible outcomes to the child and their family.

description: Blood Transfusion Service is a very important part of the contemporary healthcare system, without which proficient medical care is impracticable. Grande International Hospital with its technical strength and excellent ranking in health and allied specialties, intend to strengthen the safe blood services by contributing towards lowering hemorrhage mortality and reducing the risk of transfusion transmitted infectious diseases in Nepal. Grande International Hospital, Department of Transfusion Medicine is self-sufficient at meeting the blood requirements for all in-house patients, and also provides blood and blood components to other hospitals nearby and to other hospital all over Nepal when required. GIH blood Bank support different components and test for Liver transplant, ABO mismatch renal transplant, Bone marrow Transplant all over Nepal. GIH blood bank is the only blood center in whole Nepal where Transfusion Medicine/ Blood Bank specialist is available so it is taking responsibility for advocating the betterment of Transfusion service in Nepal. Grande International Hospital has taken the initiative towards the provision of safe blood products, Safe Blood Transfusion Services have been initiated with the strong pillars of voluntary blood donation, training of human resource, developing service delivery in blood banking and well equipped laboratory with continuous education and training in transfusion sciences. GIH blood Bank is the referral center for blood banking problems where complicated cases on Blood Groping, cross matching, antibody screening and identification, antibody titration, DAT, ICT are handled efficiently.

He currently serves as the Head of the Department of Transfusion Medicine at Grande International Hospital. Dr. Nepal brings an extensive clinical and academic background, with expertise in areas such as tissue typing, cord blood processing, bone banking, immunohematology, and apheresis. He has made substantial contributions to national transfusion services, research, and policy-making, actively serving as a Technical Advisor to the Nepal Blood Bank and Transfusion Services (NBBTS) under the Ministry of Health, Government of Nepal. description: This department deals with Genito-Urinary System in male & Urinary System only in female. Department was established from the very beginning of the GIH. One Professor & five qualified Urologists & Kidney Transplant Surgeons are providing world standard services for Kidney, Ureter, Urinary Bladder & Urethra. So far department has performed 158 Kidney Transplantation and thousands of surgery for Kidney Cancer, Kidney Stones, Urinary Bladder Cancer, Prostate Surgery and Complex Urethroplasty. Department is proud to become first in country to start RIRS (for kidney stones), Bipolar TURP for enlarged Prostate and Laparoscopic donor Nephrectomy (by Nepali Team only) in the country. Prompt diagnosis and world standard treatment is motto of the department.

M.D.( General Practice) Diploma In Mountain Medicine Council Number: 4996 Dr. Bishwa Raj Dawadi Consultant – Family Medicine, Aviation & Mountain Medicine NMC No.: 4996 Professional Summary: Dr. Bishwa Raj Dawadi is a seasoned family physician with over 20 years of experience in family medicine, aviation medicine, and mountain and travel medicine. With a multidisciplinary clinical background and advanced certifications from internationally recognized institutions, he provides holistic and preventive care tailored to diverse populations, including those exposed to extreme environments and travel-related health risks. Dr. Dawadi completed his MBBS from Bangladesh and his MD in General Practice (MDGP) from Tribhuvan University Teaching Hospital (TUTH). He holds additional diplomas in Mountain Medicine and Aviation Medicine, equipping him with unique expertise in high-altitude and flight-related health conditions. He has also held key professional roles including as an Executive Member of the Nepal Medical Council and General Secretary of GPEMAN (General Practitioners and Emergency Physicians of Nepal). Academic Background: • MBBS – Bangladesh • MDGP (General Practice) – Tribhuvan University Teaching Hospital (TUTH), Nepal • Diploma in Mountain Medicine – UIAA (International Climbing and Mountaineering Federation) • Diploma in Aviation Medicine – Germany Dr. Dawadi’s diverse academic qualifications reflect a deep commitment to integrated, preventive, and environment-specific medical care. Areas of Expertise: • Family Medicine – Comprehensive care for individuals and families across all age groups • Aviation Medicine – Health assessments and interventions related to flight and aerospace physiology • Mountain & Travel Medicine – Diagnosis and prevention of altitude sickness, travel vaccinations, and expedition-related care His broad expertise allows him to treat acute and chronic illnesses while considering environmental, occupational, and lifestyle factors.
